messages.speech: To resolve a query, update the incorrect field and select the "Data correction" reason for the change and/or provide an explanation for the discrepancy. Then click "Save" and the CRF page will be updated.

When the issue is resolved, the query will disappear. The field that has been edited will have a small yellow triangle next to it to indicate changes have been made to the data in this field and an audit trail is available to review the changes.
